Value.label: Fan Type
Value.Help: 0 = Gas, 1 = Elec

Value.label: Minimum Off Time
Value.Help: Sets the minimum off time before another heating/cooling cycle can begin to provide compressor short cycle protection. The thermostat screen will display WAIT when minimum off time is being enforced.

Value.label: Minimum Run Time
Value.Help: Sets the minimum run time before a heating/cooling cycle can turn off to prevent rapid cycling. Thermostat screen will display "Cool ON" or "Heat ON" while the minimum run time is being enforced.

Value.label: Heating Delta Stage 1 ON
Value.Help: Sets the delta from setpoint that stage 1 heating starts.

Value.label: Heating Delta Stage 1 OFF
Value.Help: Sets the delta from setpoint that stage 1 heating stops. Stage 1 turns off at setpoint minus (-) Delta Stage 1.

Value.label: Heating Delta Stage 2 ON
Value.Help: Sets the delta from setpoint that stage 2 heating starts.

Value.label: Heating Delta Stage 2 OFF
Value.Help: Sets the delta from setpoint that stage 2 heating stops. Stage 1 turns off at setpoint minus (-) Delta Stage 2.

Value.label: Heating Delta Stage 3 ON
Value.Help: Sets the delta from setpoint that stage 3 heating starts.

Value.label: Heating Delta Stage 3 OFF
Value.Help: Sets the delta from setpoint that stage 3 heating stops. Stage 1 turns off at setpoint minus (-) Delta Stage 3.

Value.label: Cooling Delta Stage 1 ON
Value.Help: Sets the delta from setpoint that stage 1 cooling starts.

Value.label: Cooling Delta Stage 1 OFF
Value.Help: Sets the delta from setpoint that stage 1 cooling stops. Stage 1 turns off at setpoint minus (-) Delta Stage 1.

Value.label: Cooling Delta Stage 2 ON
Value.Help: Sets the delta from setpoint that stage 2 cooling starts.

Value.label: Cooling Delta Stage 2 OFF
Value.Help: Sets the delta from setpoint that stage 2 cooling stops. Stage 1 turns off at setpoint minus (-) Delta Stage 2.

Value.label: H/C Delta
Value.Help: Sets the minimum separation between the heating and cooling setpoints. Attempts to lower the cooling below the heating setpoint by this amount will PUSH the heating setpoint down to maintain this separation. Same for setting the heating setpoint above the cooling setpoint, it will PUSH the cooling setpoint up to maintain this separation. Settings in F.

Value.label: SetBack Mode
Value.Help: 0 = No Setback, 1 = Setback, 2 if ESM

Value.label: ESM Setpoint--Heating
Value.Help: Energy Saving Mode (ESM) Setpoints are the setpoints used when the Energy Saving Mode schedule is selected in the Schedule Mode screen (or via Z-Wave control). Setting in F.

Value.label: ESM Setpoint--Cooling
Value.Help: Energy Saving Mode (ESM) Setpoints are the setpoints used when the Energy Saving Mode schedule is selected in the Schedule Mode screen (or via Z-Wave control).

Value.label: Fan ON Time
Value.Help: The fan cycler function cycles the HVAC system fan for an ON period followed by an OFF period continuously. Used to provide minimum air ventilation requirements. When the Fan ON time is set to a value greater than 0, an additional Cycler Fan mode is present when pressing the FAN button on the thermostat.

Value.label: Fan OFF Time
Value.Help: The fan cycler function cycles the HVAC system fan for an ON period followed by an OFF period continuously. Used to provide minimum air ventilation requirements. When the Fan ON time is set to a value greater than 0, an additional Cycler Fan mode is present when pressing the FAN button on the thermostat.

Value.label: 2nd Stage Heat Enable
Value.Help: 0 = no 2nd stage heat, 1 = 2nd stage heat.

Value.label: Aux Heat Enable
Value.Help: 0 = no aux heat, 1 = aux heat enabled.

Value.label: 2nd Stage Cool Enable
Value.Help: 0 = no 2nd stage cool, 1 = 2nd stage cool

Value.label: Run Schedule
Value.Help: Set to 1 if running schedule (RUN is displayed on the thermostat screen).

Value.label: Cooling 1 Setpoint
Value.Help: Default: HOLD 80F / 26C RUN 84F / xxC ESM

Value.label: Heating 1 Setpoint
Value.Help: Heating 1 Setpoint (does this vary with ESM, etc. or is this for the "Hold" setting? Default: HOLD 55F / 13C RUN 60F / xxC ESM 64F / xxC (unless parameter xx has been changed)

Value.label: Backlight Timeout
Value.Help: Backlight Timeout is the time (in seconds) from the last button press to the backlight going out. The time-out can be set between 0 and 120 seconds. When set to 0, the backlight will remain always on. Default: 30

Value.label: Max Heat Setpoint
Value.Help: Sets the maximum heating setpoint value. Will not ramp or accept setpoints higher than this maximum. Minimum: 55F / xxC Maximum: 90F / xxC Default: 90F / 32C

Value.label: Min Cool Setpoint
Value.Help: Sets the minimum cooling setpoint value. Will not ramp or accept setpoints lower than this minimum. Minimum: 60F / xxC Maximum: 99F / xxC Default: 60F / 15C

Value.label: Screen Timeout
Value.Help: This is the time before any screen reverts to the Minimized Screen (temperature display only), after you stop pushing buttons. Minimized Screen feature is disabled by setting this time to 0. Default: 0

Value.label: Sensor (Internal) Offset
Value.Help: The internal temperature sensor can be calibrated to report values different from its actual reading. The offset can range from -7 degrees to +7 degrees. Default: 0

Value.label: Screen Contrast
Value.Help: The Screen Contrast sets the contrast level of the LCD display. The contrast can be set between 0 and 20. If the display is too light, use a higher number. If dark lines appear on the screen, use a lower number. Default: 10

Value.label: Schedule Enable
Value.Help: When enabled (set to 1), the local thermostat's scheduler function is enabled. Default: 0

Value.label: Schedule Sun-1
Value.Help:
This value holds information about the first schedule setpoints for Sundays.
Byte 1: Hour (0-23) Byte 2: Minute (0-59) Byte 3: Heat Setpoint (degrees) Byte 4: Cool Setpoint (degrees)
Default: 0x06004643 06:00AM 70F / 67F 0x06001519 06:00AM 21C / 25C

Value.label: Schedule Sun-2
Value.Help:
This value holds information about the second schedule setpoints for Sundays.
Byte 1: Hour (0-23) Byte 2: Minute (0-59) Byte 3: Heat Setpoint (degrees) Byte 4: Cool Setpoint (degrees)
Default: 0x08003e55 08:00AM 62F / 85F 0x0800101d 08:00AM 16C / 29C

Value.label: Schedule Sun-3
Value.Help:
This value holds information about the third schedule setpoints for Sundays.
Byte 1: Hour (0-23) Byte 2: Minute (0-59) Byte 3: Heat Setpoint (degrees) Byte 4: Cool Setpoint (degrees)
Default: 0x1200464e 06:00PM 70F / 78F 0x12001519 06:00PM 21C / 25C

Value.label: Schedule Sun-4
Value.Help:
This value holds information about the fourth schedule setpoints for Sundays.
Byte 1: Hour (0-23) Byte 2: Minute (0-59) Byte 3: Heat Setpoint (degrees) Byte 4: Cool Setpoint (degrees)
Default: 0x16003e52 10:00PM 62F / 82F 0x1600101b 10:00PM 16C / 27C
